text.1: DARO est un serveur priv√© pre-renewal du jeu Ragnarok Online.
text.2: Notre objectif est de conserver les sensations du gameplay d'origine mais avec du nouveau contenu !

blessing.2: (FR) Gives an additional SkillLv% bonus to DEF and MDEF
blessing.3: (FR) Gives an additional SkillLv bonus to VIT

holylight.1: (FR) Up to Lv 5 : Each level after the first add 75% to damage (so the formula is (50 + 75 * SkillLv)%) and 0,5 seconds to timecast
holylight.2: (FR) Changes on this skill imply it is accessible in the skill tree without a link
holylight.3: (FR) A soul linked priest adds +475% damage to base formula (so the skill at level 1 is the same as before)
